plot: Three US Navy sailors are trapped in an airtight compartment aboard the USS West Virginia during the bombing of Pearl Harbor on Dec. 7, 1941. Inspired by a true story.
title: Dog It Down
plot_es: Three US Navy sailors are trapped in an airtight compartment aboard the USS West Virginia during the bombing of Pearl Harbor on Dec. 7, 1941. Inspired by a true story.
